page.title: 10Village Organisations.
page.content: There is a Playing Field Association, they keep their tools in the big garage over there.There are two,quite large allotments both on the road to Roade. There is one just past the church and another one a bit further on. It is quite a good little village for electricity.They turn the lights on when it starts to get dark and turn them off again at 12 0 clock midnight. There is a District Nurse who comes round sometimes but you do not see her a lot.There are a few Meals On Wheels which deliver dinners to the aged. Their headquarters is at Cripps House. Also there is a Merry Comrades group.They do not meet anywhere so if there is a Bazaar or anything they either phone up or send a letter. There is also a playschool in the village hall. Craig Triggs,11 yrs.
